results.title: Efficacy of simvastatin treatment of valvular interstitial cells varies with the extracellular environment.
results.text_hl: @GENE_TGFB1 @GENE_7040 @@@Transforming growth factor (TGF)-beta1@@@ was also applied as a disease stimulus to VICs on 2-D surfaces or encapsulated in 3-D collagen gels and combined with different temporal applications of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002114 @@@calcific@@@ nodule formation in a dose-dependent manner on all materials, although the level of statin efficacy was highly substrate-dependent.

citations.NLM: Monzack EL, Gu X, Masters KS. Efficacy of simvastatin treatment of valvular interstitial cells varies with the extracellular environment. Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol. 2009 Feb;29(2):246-53. PMID: 19023089
citations.BibTeX: @article{19023089, title={Efficacy of simvastatin treatment of valvular interstitial cells varies with the extracellular environment.}, author={Monzack EL and Gu X and Masters KS}, journal={Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol}, volume={29}, number={2}, pages={246-53}}

results.title: The Effect of Simvastatin on the Proliferation and Differentiation of Human Bone Marrow Stromal Cells

citations.NLM: Baek KH, Lee WY, Oh KW, Tae HJ, Lee JM, Lee EJ, Han JH, Kang MI, Cha BY, Lee KW, Son HY, Kang SK. The Effect of Simvastatin on the Proliferation and Differentiation of Human Bone Marrow Stromal Cells J Korean Med Sci. 2005 Jun;20(3):438-44. PMID: 15953866

results.title: An in vitro study of a titanium surface modified by simvastatin-loaded titania nanotubes-micelles.
results.text_hl: The results indicate that the @CHEMICAL_Titanium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014025 @@@Ti@@@ surface with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@-loaded @CHEMICAL_Trinitrotoluene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014303 @@@TNTs@@@-micelles not only has better able to promote early adhesion, spreading and early differentiation of osteoblasts than the @CHEMICAL_Titanium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014025 @@@Ti@@@ surface with @CHEMICAL_Trinitrotoluene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014303 @@@TNTs@@@ alone but it is able to promote @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002114 @@@calcification of osteoblasts@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu X, Li X, Li S, Zhou X, Li S, Wang Q, Dai J, Lai R, Xie L, Zhong M, Zhang Y, Zhou L. An in vitro study of a titanium surface modified by simvastatin-loaded titania nanotubes-micelles. J Biomed Nanotechnol. 2014 Feb;10(2):194-204. PMID: 24738328
citations.BibTeX: @article{24738328, title={An in vitro study of a titanium surface modified by simvastatin-loaded titania nanotubes-micelles.}, author={Liu X and Li X and Li S and Zhou X and Li S and Wang Q and Dai J and Lai R and Xie L and Zhong M and Zhang Y and Zhou L}, journal={J Biomed Nanotechnol}, volume={10}, number={2}, pages={194-204}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin in apolipoprotein E deficient mice with surgically induced chronic renal failure.
results.text_hl: However, @DISEASE_Dental_Plaque @DISEASE_MESH:D003773 @@@aortic plaques@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treated @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ showed significantly less @<m>DISEASE_Calcinosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002114 @@@calcification@@@ than those in controls with @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ (p <0.03).

citations.NLM: Ivanovski O, Szumilak D, Nguyen-Khoa T, Nikolov IG, Joki N, Mothu N, Maizel J, Westenfeld R, Ketteler M, Lacour B, Drüeke TB, Massy ZA. Effect of simvastatin in apolipoprotein E deficient mice with surgically induced chronic renal failure. J Urol. 2008 Apr;179(4):1631-6. PMID: 18295249
citations.BibTeX: @article{18295249, title={Effect of simvastatin in apolipoprotein E deficient mice with surgically induced chronic renal failure.}, author={Ivanovski O and Szumilak D and Nguyen-Khoa T and Nikolov IG and Joki N and Mothu N and Maizel J and Westenfeld R and Ketteler M and Lacour B and Drüeke TB and Massy ZA}, journal={J Urol}, volume={179}, number={4}, pages={1631-6}}
